Class AbstractRoutingStrategy

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.centurylink.mdw.common.service.AbstractRoutingStrategy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RegisteredService, RequestRoutingStrategy
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LoadBasedRoutingStrategy, RoundRobinRoutingStrategy

    public abstract class AbstractRoutingStrategy
extends java.lang.Object
implements RequestRoutingStrategy
    General strategy class to be inherited by all specific routing strategies created.
